ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] How to switch off crawl.log
ygData.msgSnippet: The crawl log is seen as a vital record of the crawl s progress so I m curious as to why you d want to turn it off. There is no option in the web ui to turn it

The crawl log is seen as a vital record of the crawl's progress so I'm
curi=
ous as to why you'd want to turn it off. 

There is no option in the web ui=
 to turn it off, but if you edit the
heritrix.properties file and change th=
e line:

crawl.level=3D INFO

to:

crawl.level=3D OFF 

you should suppress=
 any _writing_ to it. The crawl.log file will still show
up however.

Note =
that this will affect all crawls so you'll have to change it back to
enable=
 the crawl.log for subsequent crawls.

- Kris
